name: Cloud Forest
description:
Cloud Forest is a relaxing walking sim with small environmental puzzles. Throughout the map there are little terrariums with lotus flowers inside of them that act as batteries. These battery terrariums are placed on power zones that activate and change components of the world around it. 

The original project came from Arjun’s midterm project, the adaptation of the Cloud Forest in Singapore. For the final project, we changed the artistic direction from a natural forest setting to a digital forest setting.
